
## Rule `r rule_order$diversity_of_roles`: Decide what you're willing to sell

Scholarly statistical analysis tasks make up only a small fraction of the tasks that you'll get asked to do.

- A stats Ph.D. friend: "I spend almost all my time doing complicated SQL queries and data cleaning in SAS"
- I spent 6 months leading a team to obtain and standardize cyber security incident data 
- Turning an analysis crank: implementing a pre-defined set of models
- Shady correlation analysis: "we need a story"
- Instruments of greed, surveillance, war
